content: संसारः {@--1@} Course, passage. {@--2@} The course or circuit of worldly life, secular life, mundane existence, the world; असारः संसारः <ls>U. 1</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 30</ls>; संसारधन्वभुवि किं सारमामृशसि शंसाधुना शुभमते <ls>Aśvad. 22</ls>; or परिवर्तिनि संसारे मृतः को वा न जायते <ls>Pt. 1. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Transmigration, metempsychosis, succession of births. {@--4@} Worldly illusion.
